Package contractgen.riscv.isa.tests

Class RISCVTestGenerator

java.lang.Object
contractgen.riscv.isa.tests.RISCVTestGenerator
public class RISCVTestGenerator extends Object
A generator for RISC-V test cases.

  • Method Details

    • generate

      public List<TestCase> generate()
      Generates a list of test cases by generating a random initial valuation for each register, a random instruction of a certain type and suffix to be appended to the program.
      Returns:
      The list of test cases.

    • randomRegisters

      private Map<Integer,Integer> randomRegisters()

    • alterObservation

      private Pair<List<RISCVInstruction>,List<RISCVInstruction>> alterObservation(RISCV_OBSERVATION_TYPE type, RISCVInstruction instruction)
      Alters a given instruction to introduce a specific possible leakage. In most cases this requires executing different instructions before the relevant instruction to alter the architectural state accordingly.
      Parameters:
      type - The type of observation that should be triggered.
      instruction - The instruction to be altered.
      Returns:
      A pair of sequences of instructions.

    • getBound

      private static long getBound(RISCVInstruction instruction)

      private List<RISCVInstruction> randomSequence(int size)
